errors.error_description: The README suggests a non-existent command `regions --citation` to generate the citation text, which will fail.
correction_candidates:
please include the following acknowledgment::

    This research made use of Regions, an Astropy package for region
    handling (Bradley et al. 202X).
please include the citation (Bradley et al. 202X).
please cite the Zenodo record for the version used.
please see the CITATION file for an example BibTeX entry.
errors.golden_answer:
please include the following acknowledgment::

    This research made use of Regions, an Astropy package for region
    handling (Bradley et al. 202X).
